content: Per Newton, come per Boyle e Cartesio, c'erano leggi di natura solo perch√© c'era stato un Legislatore (Divino).
translations: eng:For Newton, as for Boyle and Descartes, there were laws of nature only because there had been a (Divine) Legislator
